--------------------------------------------
ch1 threshold PSD_thr_low PSD_thr_mid PSD_thr_high
....
ch32 threshold PSD_thr_low PSD_thr_mid PSD_thr_high
threshold = 1 ~ 16383
PSD threshold low = 0 ~ 0.999
PSD threshold mid = 0 ~ 0.999
PSD threshold high = 0 ~ 0.999
PSD : gamma = low ~ mid, neutron = mid ~ high
